animationList.name: Quick Connect
animationList.description: Reduces bussing connections from many to one

animationList.name: Quick Torque
animationList.description: Eliminates torque readings with its simplified breakaway nut design

animationList.name: Quick Phase
animationList.description: Allows for independent phasing which streamlines ordering and phase balancing.

animationList.name: Quick Roll
animationList.description: Allows modules to glide down mounting rail for easy installation and lineup.

animationList.name: Quick Bolt
animationList.description: Makes mechanical connections faster using spring loaded, captive bolts that pass through automatically when lined up.
